thread.title: adidas Originals x Mini Rodini Come Together for a Heart-Melting Collection
thread.title_full: adidas Originals x Mini Rodini Come Together for a Heart-Melting Collection

author: Graeme Campbell
title: adidas Originals x Mini Rodini Come Together for a Heart-Melting Collection
text:
Previous Next 
Well, this is adorable. For what is undoubtedly the cutest collection of SS17, adidas Originals has come together with Swedish childrenswear brand Mini Rodini. 
The limited-edition unisex range comprises adidas Originals classics including the Firebird track top and Stan Smith sneakers. Heart-melting, hand-drawn bunny rabbit graphics by Mini Rodini founder and creative director Cassandra Rhodin feature prominently on the apparel, while the mini kicks incorporate Primeknit technology and a sparkly midsole. Previous Next 
The apparel is available in sizes for children aged 3 months to 6 years. Footwear ranges from sizes 3.5k to 9k. 
Look out for the adidas Orginals x Mini Rodini collection hitting flagship stores on March 9. You can also purchase at the adidas Originals website . 
Staying with the Three Stripes, hereâ€™s a better look at the much-hyped Iniki Runner .
